QuestData.Title: Chasing the Storm
QuestData.Description: We need to figure out where they are taking the Thunder King's remains. It won't be possible for them to resurrect him in the Valley of the Emperors. They would need to be somewhere remote and secure.$b$bIt appears that getting out of here may also prove to be a challenge....$b$bFight your way out and look for information concerning the location of the remains.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Blood-Revealed Map on a Zandalari Warrior.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to find any information on their location?
QuestData.RewardText: This is dark Zandalari blood magic. Once we're done with the map it should be burned.$b$bThe map indicates they have headed for the coast just outside of a tiny fishing village called Zouchin. The villagers there may be able to help us find the Zandalari. We just have to hope the village is still standing...
